content.body: Justin Ridgewell: unfortunately I only now noticed that someone else already added an `array-grouping` feature to features.txt and used it in the Symbol.unscopables test, so the one added in your PR is redundant. I really don't want to ask you to do another round of revision, so I'll fix up your branch to use the existing feature name and merge it if that's OK with you; give a shout soon-ish if you don't want that
